dict.string:
{ app_path=$(ps -xwwp $PPID -o command|grep -o '.*.app') echo -n "$(date +%H:%M) " >>/tmp/restart.log ps -xp $PPID|tail -n1 >>/tmp/restart.log osascript -e 'tell app "TextMate" to quit'
for (( i = 0; i < 5 && $(echo $(ps -xp $PPID|wc -l))-1; i++ )); do sleep .2; done
echo -n "$(date +%H:%M) " >>/tmp/restart.log ps -xp $PPID|wc -l >>/tmp/restart.log
if [[ $(ps -xp $PPID|wc -l) -ne 2 ]]; then echo -n "$(date +%H:%M) " >>/tmp/restart.log echo "$app_path" >>/tmp/restart.log open "$app_path" fi
} &>/dev/null &
